column2: Euronav NV engages in the transportation and storage of crude oil. The company is headquartered in Antwerp, Antwerpen and currently employs 2,900 full-time employees. The firm provides shipping services, in addition to the carriage of crude oil on its fleet of large tankers. The Company, along with its group entities, operates in two business segments: the operation of crude oil tankers on the international markets (tankers), and the floating production, storage and offloading operations. The Companyâ€™s ship management services include, among others, technical services, fleet personnel management, environmental, protection management system, commercial management and operational management. Its group companies include Euronav Ship Management SAS, Euronav Shipping NV, Euronav Tankers NV, Euronav SAS, Euronav UK Ltd., Euronav Hong Kong Ltd. and Great Hope Enterprises Ltd.
